attributes.action: EXPLAIN THE PAYMENT TO MEN WITH STATE MONEY WHO ARE BREAKING UK LAW BY HAVING MORE THAN ONE WIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WHY ARE YOU THE GOVERMENT ALLOWING PEOPLE IN THIS COUNTRY TO HAVE MORE THAN ONE WIFE.
WHY ARE YOU GIVING THEM EXTRA PAYMENT FROM TAX PAYERS EARNINGS TO SUBSIDISE THIS BLATTANT LAW BREAKING.
EXPLAIN THIS TO US.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
